text: Irma Lanzas (7 August 1933 – 11 July 2020) was a Salvadoran writer and educator. She was a member of the Academia Salvadoreña de la Lengua. She was born in Cojutepeque, El Salvador. Lanzas died in San Salvador on 11 July 2020, aged 86. ==References== Category:Salvadoran academics Category:Salvadoran writers Category:1933 births Category:2020 deaths
title: Irma Lanzas
